channel.title: Dead to Rights on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Dead to Rights on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: China Box Office: ‘Dead to Rights’ Opens on Top as Local Films Dominate, ‘Fantastic Four’ Debuts at No. 5
item.description: China’s weekend box office continued to be driven by local-language releases, with four out of the top five titles produced locally. “Dead to Rights” (China Film) opened at No. 1 with RMB315.1 million
